subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Nathan Horton and Gregory Campbell scored during a 35-second span in a four-goal third period that carried the Boston Bruins to a 4-1 victory Thursday night over the Devils.
snippet: Nathan Horton and Gregory Campbell scored during a 35-second span in a four-goal third period that carried the Boston Bruins to a 4-1 victory Thursday night over the Devils.
